name: Two Worlds (itch) (Ronald DeSilva)
description:
Two Worlds is an entry in the FSU Fall Jam 2021. The game is a platformer which has the player switching realms to make platforms and enemies appear and disappear.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Up Arrow to jump
  • Spacebar to change worlds

Credits:

Ronald DeSilva - Programmer, Producer, Sound designer

Joseph Afflitto - Level Designer

Sean Ramirez - Art Assets
